dnsZone.description: The DNS zone (aka base URL) that the ingress rule listens on

internal.description: Whether or not this should be fulfilled by an internal load balancer (e.g. no public IP)

name.description: Name to give to the ingress rule resource

namespace.description: Namespace to put the ingress rule in

path.description: The path the ingress rule listens on

port.description: Port that the ingress rule listens for traffic on

protocol.description: The protocol the ingress rule listens for traffic on

registry.description: Unique ID of the service registry this rule will be stored in

service.description: Service the ingress forwards traffic to

subdomain.description: The subdomain the ingress rule listens on
